channel.title: mrs.space.cadet TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from mrs.space.cadet

item.title: Did I mention I tried so hard?! I very much dislike mile time trials because I don’t like trying hard or feeling uncomfortable and they are both of those things. These are called “magic miles” in the Galloway Method and the last one I did was five weeks b

item.title: I do my best confronting by myself during long runs. #running #whocares
item.description: I do my best confronting by myself during long runs. #running #whocares

item.title: These step by step instructions on how to get out for a run when you really don’t want to will stand the test of time so I will be posting this annually for anyone who is new here. Also if you’re new here, Hi 👋 Welcome to unhinged chaos. #howto #fitness
item.description: These step by step instructions on how to get out for a run when you really don’t want to will stand the test of time so I will be posting this annually for anyone who is new here. Also if you’re new here, Hi 👋 Welcome to unhinged chaos. #howto #fitness

item.title: #stitch with @ashleyholston Thank you to everyone who supported my content on here. I’m other places too but it’s sad to see this possibly end when I think about everything we’ve all experienced together on this app 😭😭😭😭 #tiktokban #sad #memories
item.description: #stitch with @ashleyholston Thank you to everyone who supported my content on here. I’m other places too but it’s sad to see this possibly end when I think about everything we’ve all experienced together on this app 😭😭😭😭 #tiktokban #sad #memories

item.title: Sometimes I decide to do things and then during the doing I’m like why did I choose this and this is one of those things 💕 ✨ I ran about 9 miles of this 12 mile run around the track and I’m still tired mentally and physically ten days later 🌴 #marathontr
item.description: Sometimes I decide to do things and then during the doing I’m like why did I choose this and this is one of those things 💕 ✨ I ran about 9 miles of this 12 mile run around the track and I’m still tired mentally and physically ten days later 🌴 #marathontr

item.title: I know better than to think about doing this for 26.2 miles 😮‍💨 It also doesn’t help that I had a horrible 14 mile run the other day (stay tuned for that garbage). #runwalkrun #gallowaymethod #marathontraining
item.description: I know better than to think about doing this for 26.2 miles 😮‍💨 It also doesn’t help that I had a horrible 14 mile run the other day (stay tuned for that garbage). #runwalkrun #gallowaymethod #marathontraining

item.title: Apparently you have to practice more than three weeks on Duo Lingo to learn French, but I got at least one of these pronunciations mostly right. We filmed these clips in August at the Paris Paralympics and I just found the footage so I hope you enjoy the

item.title: Thank you for the comments and messages because I would’ve just struggled through training doing the wrong intervals 🫣 If you’re following the Galloway method, make sure you’re not following the suggested intervals based on your magic mile pace. Go off of

item.title: I filmed this BEFORE I realized I was doing the Galloway method wrong 😑 I’m sure it wouldn’t have been such a dumpster fire if I was following the correct run/walk/run intervals but I guess we’ll never know #marathontraining #running #oops #momlife
item.description: I filmed this BEFORE I realized I was doing the Galloway method wrong 😑 I’m sure it wouldn’t have been such a dumpster fire if I was following the correct run/walk/run intervals but I guess we’ll never know #marathontraining #running #oops #momlife

item.title: In case this is goodbye… It’s been a great run (pun intended). Thank you all for everything 💕 Find me on all platforms just search Mrs. Space Cadet/ Erin Azar #running #tiktokban #goodbye
item.description: In case this is goodbye… It’s been a great run (pun intended). Thank you all for everything 💕 Find me on all platforms just search Mrs. Space Cadet/ Erin Azar #running #tiktokban #goodbye

item.title: Sorry and it will happen again. Running in the cold is one thing but cold and WINDY?! Immediately no. #runlife #slowrunner #mid #sorry
item.description: Sorry and it will happen again. Running in the cold is one thing but cold and WINDY?! Immediately no. #runlife #slowrunner #mid #sorry

item.title: For context, my previous two time trials were 9:46min/mile in November and 8:52min/mile in December. The time trial is running all out as fast as I can for one mile. It’s hard for me to care about pace but I’ll try for the sake of seeing if I can improve.
item.description: For context, my previous two time trials were 9:46min/mile in November and 8:52min/mile in December. The time trial is running all out as fast as I can for one mile. It’s hard for me to care about pace but I’ll try for the sake of seeing if I can improve.

item.title: Hopefully Jared Verse doesn’t catch wind of this very official sports news segment because his feelings might get hurt. I think Bucky and I have a future in sports broadcasting. What do you think? And who do you want to win Sunday’s game?! Go birds! 🦅 #t
item.description: Hopefully Jared Verse doesn’t catch wind of this very official sports news segment because his feelings might get hurt. I think Bucky and I have a future in sports broadcasting. What do you think? And who do you want to win Sunday’s game?! Go birds! 🦅 #t

item.title: This felt like a fever dream. 17 miles on the treadmill while adjusting the pace every 30 seconds for run/walk/run intervals seemed daunting at first, but I simply turned into a robot and didn’t even realize I was doing the motions after a while. I do not
item.description: This felt like a fever dream. 17 miles on the treadmill while adjusting the pace every 30 seconds for run/walk/run intervals seemed daunting at first, but I simply turned into a robot and didn’t even realize I was doing the motions after a while. I do not

item.title: High cholesterol…what am I, 65 years old?! And why does it take so long for it to go down? And why are they suggesting boiling fish?! Get ready for some unhinged rage-filled cooking videos 😇 #hearthealth #learnwithme #tryingnewthings #cookingathome
item.description: High cholesterol…what am I, 65 years old?! And why does it take so long for it to go down? And why are they suggesting boiling fish?! Get ready for some unhinged rage-filled cooking videos 😇 #hearthealth #learnwithme #tryingnewthings #cookingathome

item.title: First time trial was 9:46, then 8:52, then 10:06 (womp womp) so this felt good but like not physically it was very uncomfortable and I did not like it. #running #runwithme #marathontraining #realistic

item.title: The best touchdown dances are fueled by the best sleep! That’s why 81% of NFL players in the Super Bowl have a @Sleep Number smart bed 🏈🙌😎

item.title: How do NFL Players prioritize comfort on the go? They might not all have a head coach of comfort, but they DO have @Sleep Number products to help! How do you prioritize rest and comfort when you’re traveling? #comfort #travel #nfl #superbowl

item.title: A professional struggle runner interviewing an NFL running back…I think it’s a good combo! Big thanks to Adidas for the media time with my new friend, @showtyme_33 🤓🎤🏈🙌 Ok now back to real life and running content 🫡 #sportsnews #tryingnewthings #running

item.title: #ad Run boredom is a thing and it happens to the best of us! When I have seemingly endless long runs, I always like to have a suspenseful title cued up on @Audible. When I’m not running, I make sure to have an audiobook in the well-being category ready to

item.title: The first run after any missed training runs fills me with so much dread. I’m always glad to get it over with and get back to consistency, but I procrastinated this run until 5pm 😑 Is this a universal feeling?? #runcommunity #marathontraining #treadmill
item.description: The first run after any missed training runs fills me with so much dread. I’m always glad to get it over with and get back to consistency, but I procrastinated this run until 5pm 😑 Is this a universal feeling?? #runcommunity #marathontraining #treadmill

item.title: Would you survive running 340 miles alone?? I’d report from the sidelines but I don’t know where that is because everything is secret! The Speed Project is an unsanctioned race…no rules, no spectators, just point A to point B and lots of suffering in betw
